div.p:
caturbhuja caturmāranirjitavisuddhiḥ | pūrvoktarūpavarṇṇahūṁbhavaḥ | prathamavāmabhujena narakapāla devāsurāṇāṃ raktena pūritaṃ |
prathamadakṣiṇabhujena vajraṃ śeṣabhujābhyām prajñāliṅgitaṃ | vajravārāhī prajñā bhagavanrūpiṇī |

ṣaḍbhujaṃ trimukhaṃ vāmaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇa candrāruṇābhaṃ
prathamaṃ nīlaṃ | nagnaḥ pūrvoktavarṇṇarūpaṃ bhujānāṃ pāramitāvisuddhiḥ | prathamaṃ vāmabhuje trisūlaṃ | dakṣiṇe vajraṃ | vāmabhuje ghaṇṭā | dvitīyadakṣiṇato kartṛ | śe
ṣadvibhujābhyāṃ vajrasṛṃkhalāsamāpatyā | yad bhagavān tadvat prajñā savyāvasavye kartṛkapālaḥ | traidhātukātmakamṛtakākrāntaḥ ||
devatāpaṭalas tṛtīyaḥ || ||

pūjyānunāthyate || oṃ abhiṣicaṃtu māṃ sarvavajratathāgatā iti |

tair buddhair herukākārarūpaiḥ pañcāmṛtabhṛttapañcas tathāgatātmakaiḥ kalaśaiḥ pañcabhir a
bhiṣicyate | abhiṣiṃcyamāno puṣpavṛṣṭir bhavati | dundubhiśabdo bhavati | kuṅkumavṛṣṭir bhavati |

rūpavajrādibhiḥ pūjyate | vajragītyā locanādibhi gīyate |
abhiṣicyamāno mūrdhnāyāṃ svakuleso bhavati | etena herukaniṣpannaḥ trisandhyādhiṣṭhānabhāvanāṃ vibhāvya uttiṣṭhet | devatāmūrttyā sthātavyaṃ || ||

lg.l: jananīm bhaginīṃ caiva pūjayed yogavit sadā |
naṭīṃ rajakīṃ tathā vajrīṃ caṇḍālīm brāhmaṇīn tathā ||
sevitavyā prayatnena yathā bhedo na jāyate |
vajraṃ padmaṃ tathā karma tathāgataṃ ratnam eva ca |
vajraṃ ḍombī bhaven mudrā padmaṃ narttī tathaiva ca |
karma rajakī sadākhyātā brāhmaṇī ca tathāgatā ||
tathatāyāṃ gataḥ srīmān āgataś ca tathaiva ca |

kulāni ṣaḍvidhā
ny āhuḥ saṃkṣepeṇa tu pañcadhā |

kulyate gaṇyate aneneti
kulam ity abhidhīyate ||

brahmā nirvṛtito buddho viṣanād viṣṇur ucyate |

ni sthitaḥ |
satsukhatvena tatvaṃ ca vibuddho bodhanād rateḥ ||

jananī bhaṇyate prajñā janayati yasmāj jagajjanaṃ |

bhaginīti tathā pra
jñā vibhāgaṃ darśayed yataḥ |
rajakīti ca duhitā ca narttakī ca prakathyate ||

nartta
kī bhaṇyate prajñā cañcalatvān mahākṛpa |
asparśā bhagavatī yasmāt ḍombī tasmāt prakathyate ||

maṇḍalaṃ pādalekhyaḥ
syān malanān maṇḍalam ucyate ||
tad dhyeyaṃ cintitaṃ yac ca dhyeyaṃ yasmād vicintanaṃ ||

pitari prāptaṃ yat saukhyaṃ tat sukhaṃ bhuñja
te svayaṃ |
maraṇaṃ yena sukheneha tat sukhaṃ dhyānam ucyate ||

div.p: tatvapaṭalaḥ pañcamaḥ || ||

lg.l: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi caryā pāragatāṃ varāṃ |
kaṭyāṃ mekhalaṃ caiva pādayor nūpuraṃ tathā |

bā
humūle ca keyūraṃ grīvāyām asthimālikā |
anekenaiva varṇṇena yasmād bhedo na lakṣyate |
ekavṛkṣe smasāne vā bhāvanā kathyate subhā ||
mātṛgṛhe tathā rātrau athavā vijane prāntare ||
kiñcid ūṣme tu saṃprāpte caryāṃ kartuṃ yadīṣyate |
siddhiṃ gantuṃ yadīcchāsti caryayā tv anayā caret ||

vajrakanyām imāṃ gṛ
hya caryā kartun tu budhyate ||

div.p: vajrakulābhāvāt sveṣṭadevatāyāḥ kulena kriyate | athavā cānyakulodbhavāṃ bodhibījeṇa saṃskṛtāṃ gṛhya ||

lg.l: tarhi vajrapadair nāṭyaṃ kurute yogī samāhitaḥ |

mantrasuddhyā ta
thā gītā narttanā bhāvanā kṛtā ||
tasmād gītañ ca nāṭyañ ca kurute yogī sadā sadā |
bhakṣitavyaṃ tu bhaiṣajyam pātavyaṃ vāri nityatāṃ ||

jarāmṛtyur na bādheta rakṣābhūtaḥ
sadā bhavet |
bhasma keśapavitraṃ ca yogī bibhaārtti caryayā |

jāpaṃ bhāvyaṃ bhaved etad vajra
kāpālacaryayā |
lobha moha bhaya krodhaṃ vrīḍā kāryaṃ ca varjayet |
nidrām ātmānam utsṛjya caryā kriyate na saṃsayaḥ |
śarīraṃ dānaṃ datvā paścāc caryā samārabhet |

bhā
gābhāgavicāreṇa tasmād dānan na dīyate |
bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ tathā pānaṃ yathāprāptaṃ tu bhakṣayet |

bhakṣyābhakṣyavicāran tu pe
yāpeyaṃ tathaiva ca |
gamyāgamyan tathā mantrī vikalpaṃ naiva kārayet |
śakratulyo pi yo daityaḥ surato bhavati niścitaṃ |

bhayaṃ tatra na ku
rvīta siṃharūpeṇa paryaṭet |

div.p: caryāpaṭalaḥ ṣaṣṭḥaḥ || ||

atha cchommāpaṭalaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ |
yena vijñāyate bhrātā bhaginīṃ cāpi na saṃsayaḥ |

lg.l: ekāṃgulin darśayed yas tu dvābhyāṃ susvāgato bhavet |
anāmikān tu yo dadyāt tasya kaniṣṭhikāṃ |
madhyamāṃ darśayed yas tu dadyāt tasya pradesikāṃ |
anāmikāṃ darśayed yas tu grīvāṃ tasya pradarśayet |
paṭṭisaṃ darśayed yas tu triśūlaṃ tasya pradarśayet |
stanaṃ darśayed yas tu sīmāṃ tasya pradarśayet |
medinīn darśayed yas tu vaktraṃ tasya pradarśayet |

bhṛkuṭiṃ darśayed yas tu
kṣāmokṣo bhidhīyate |
lalāṭaṃ darśayed yas tu pṛṣṭhaṃ tasya pradarśayet |
pādatalaṃ darśayed yas tu krīḍate nandukena tu |

vadantri
nīs tatra aho putra mahākṛpā |
yadi mālāhastaṃ darśayanti militavyam iti kathayanti |
mālābhiḥ preṣitāṃ kṛtvā samaye tiṣṭha suvrate |

bāhyeti tatra melāyāṃ divya
gocaram āśritāyāṃ |
tatra melāyāṃ yad vadanti yoginyas tat sarvaṃ karttavyaṃ ||

div.p:
he bhagavan ke te melāpakasthānāḥ || bhagavān āha ||

m eva ca |

daśabhūmīśvarā nāthā e
bhir anyair na kathyaṃte ||

div.p:
he bhagavan ke te pīṭhādayaḥ || bhagavān āha ||
pīṭhaṃ jālandharaṃ khyātam uḍyāyanaṃ tathaiva ca |
pīṭhaṃ polagiraṃ kāmarūpaṃ tathaiva ca |

mālavaṃ proktaṃ sindhu nagaram eva ca |

ca tathaiva ca |

rikā |

va ca |

kṛpām utpādya yatnena māraṇaṃ krīyate viduḥ |
kṛpāhīnā na sidhyanti tasmāt karuṇām upārjayet |

duṣṭā

div.p:
tatra evam mantavyaṃ ||
dinas tu bhagavān vajrī naktaṃ prajñā ca prakathyate |

lg.l: nākāryaṃ vidyate kiñcin nābhakṣyaṃ vidyate sadā |

nāci
tyam vidyate hy atra nāvācyaṃ yac chubhāśubhaṃ |
yathātmani tathā satve tathātmany aham paraṃ |
rukārāpagataṃ vyūhaṃ ka iti na kvacit sthitaṃ |

yeṣāṃ yeṣān tu jaṃ
tūnāṃ pisitam asnīyate budhaiḥ ||
te te satvā vaśaṃ yānti vajrakāpālayogataḥ ||

syāmaḥ ||

tṛtī
ye bhāvayet pītāṃ caturthaṃ haritakān tathā |
ṣaḍ aṅgaṃ bhāvayed yogī paścād viramāntaṃ punas tathā |
khadhātāv iti padmeṣu jñānaṃ bhagam iti smṛtaṃ |

bhāvane
ti samāpatti tatsukhaṃ cakram ucyate |
yathodayaṃ bhavec chukraṃ dvaividhyaṃ sahajan tataḥ |

yoṣit tāvad bhavet prajñā upāyaḥ puru
ṣaḥ smṛtaḥ |
puṃsi tāvat dvaividhyaṃ śukran tasya sukhañ ca vā |
prajñāyām api yathā puṃsi śukraṃ tasya sukhañ ca vā |

ata eva hy āna
ndānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ prabhedataḥ |
ānandaṃ prathamaṃ vīraṃ paramānaṃ tu yoginī |

suratānandaṃ samastaṃ vai tatsukhopāya sarva
vit |
viramānandair virāgaḥ syāt sahajānandan tu śeṣataḥ ||

tṛtīyaṃ rā
ganāsatvāc caturthaṃ tena bhāvyate |
paramānandaṃ bhavaṃ proktaṃ nirvāṇañ ca virāmataḥ |

nānyena kathyate sahajaṃ na kasminn a
pi labhyate |

hīnaṃ sūkṣmaṃ pa
dārthan tu utkṛṣṭaṃ bhāvam ucyate |
madhyamaṃ varjitaṃ dvābhyām anyānīti ṣaḍ indriyaṃ |
samaṃ tulyam ity uktaṃ tasya cakro rasa smṛtaḥ |
samarasan tv ekabhāvaṃ tv anenārthena bhaṇyate |
madbhavā hi jagat sarva madbhavaṃ bhuvanatrayaṃ |

mayā vyāptam idaṃ sarvaṃ nānyamayaṃ dṛśya
te jagat |
eva matvā tu vai yogī yo bhyaset susamāhitaḥ |
sa sidhyati na sadeho mandapuṇyo pi mānavaḥ |
khāne pāne tathā snāne jāgrata supte pi cintayet |
bhāvyaṃte hi jagat sarve manasā yasmān na bhāvyate |
teṣām eka paran nāsti svasaṃvedyaṃ mahat sukhaṃ |
svasaṃvedyād bhavet siddhiḥ svasaṃvedyaṃ hi bhāvanā |

svasaṃvedyamayaṃ karmma bā
dhanāt karma jāyate |
svayaṃ hartā svayaṃ karttā svayaṃ rājā svayaṃ prabhuḥ |
rāgaṃ dveṣan tathā īrṣā mohaṃ mānan tathaiva ca |
sarve te tataḥ pade ramye kalāṃ nārghanti ṣoḍaśīṃ |
śukrākāro bhaved bhagavā tatsukhaṃ kāminī smṛtaṃ |

ekānekaviyogo sau kṣa
ṇād ekā parā ratiḥ |
pṛthivī āpa vāyuś ca teja ākāsa eva ca |

kṣa
ṇāt sarve na bādhante svaparasaṃvittivedanaṃ |
svargamartyaiś ca pātālair ekamūrtti bhavet kṣaṇāt |
siddhir na syād bhavec chuddhā punajanmabhavāntare |
na ca tena vinā siddhir iha loke paratra ca ||
na jñātaṃ yena hevajraṃ tathā tasya pariśramaṃ |

div.p: iti yoginīcakre mahāyoginīnāṃ melāpakapaṭalo nāma ṣṭamaḥ |

ataḥ paraṃ visuddhipaṭalaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ |
sarveṣāṃ khalu vastūnāṃ visuddhis tathatā smṛtā |
paścād ekaikabhedena devatānān tu kathyate ||

lg.l:
ṣaḍ endriyaṃ pañca skandhaṃ ṣaḍ āyatana pañca
mahābhūtaṃ |

rū
paviṣayādi ye py anye pratibhāsante hi yogināṃ |
sarve te śuddhabhāvā hi yasmād buddhamayaṃ jagat ||

div.p:
he bhagavan ke te aviśuddhāḥ || bhagavān āha || rūpādayaḥ kasmā
hyagrāhakabhāvāt || vajragarbha uvāca ke te grāhyagrāhakāś ceti ||

bhagavān āha ||
cakṣuṣā gṛhyate rūpaṃ śabdaḥ karṇṇena gṛhyate |
gandhaṃ nāsikayā ceti jihvayā svādanaṃ viduḥ |

lg.l:
kāyena spṛsyate va
stu manaḥ sukhādim āpnute ||
rūpaskandhe bhaved vajrā gaurī vedanāyā smṛtā |
sadā hy āsāṃ viśuddhyā tu sidhyante tatvayoginaḥ ||
aiśānye pukkasī khyātā agnau śabarī tathaiva ca |

naiṛtye sthāpya caṇḍā
lī vāyavye ḍombinī sthitā ||
indre gaurī yame caurī vettālī vāruṇe disi |

kauvere ghasmarī caiva adhare bhūca
rī smṛtā |
rūpe gaurī sadākhyātā sabde caurī prakīrttitā |

vettā
lī gandhabhāge ca rase ghaśmarī prakīrttitā ||
sadā hy āsāṃ viśuddhyā tu sidhyante tatvayoginaḥ |

bhujānāṃ śūnyatā śuddhiś caraṇai māra
śuddhitaḥ |
pṛthivī pukkasī khyātā abdhātu śabarī smṛtā |
tejaś caṇḍālinī jñeyā vāyur ḍombī prakīrttitā ||

dveṣākhyāpitā va
jrī rāgā ca vāriyoginī
tena tu tena tu bandhana muñce |
tasmād gandha na śabda na rūpaṃ

spa
rśa na dharma na sarvaviśuddhyā

div.p: viśuddhipaṭalo navamaḥ || ||

lg.l: śiṣyam abhiṣicyate yena vidhiṃ cāpi pravakṣyate |

di
vyena rajalekhena athavā madhyamena tu |
trihasta maṇḍalaṃ kāryaṃ trayāṃguṣṭhādhikañ ca tu ||

vidyā tatra praveṣṭavyāḥ divyāḥ pañcakulo
dbhavāḥ ||
athavā yāṃ tāṃ yathālabdhāṃ ṣoḍaśābdāṃ tathaiva ca |
tāvat sevyate mudrā yāvac chukravatī bhavet |
mudrāyās tu mukhaṃ badvā upāyasya mukhan tathā |

sevayās tatra ya
d udbhūtaṃ śiṣyavaktre nipātayet |

khasamaṃ virajaṃ śūnyaṃ bhāvābhāvā
tmakaṃ paraṃ |
sa eva prāṇināṃ prāṇaḥ sa eva paramākṣaraḥ |
bhāvābhāvau tadudbhūtau anyāni yāni tāni ca |
sarvaṃ vijñānarūpaṃ ca puruṣaṃ purāṇam īsvaraṃ |
ātmā jīvaṃ ca satvaṃ ca kālaḥ pudgala eva ca |

sarvabhāvasva
bhāvo sau māyārūpī ca saṃsthitaḥ |
dvitīyaṃ viramākhyaṃ tu caturthaṃ sahajaṃ sṛtaṃ ||

evaṃ srutvā tu vai sarve vajragarbhā
dayo budhaḥ |
viramānandaṃ jagac caiva na vidyet sahajaṃ triṣu ||
na rāgo na virāgasya madhyamā nopalabhyate |

trayāṇāṃ varjanād eva sahajaḥ
saṃbodhir ucyate ||
athavā sarvātmakaḥ saiva athavā sarvai vivarjitaḥ |
prathamaṃ meghavad bhāti siddhe tu māyāvad bhavet |
ity āha maṇḍalaṃ śāstā catuṣkoṇaṃ samujjvalaṃ |
dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ tathā gandhaṃ aṣṭakalaśādibhir yutaṃ |

te ca pa
llavāgrāḥ syur vastrācchāditakandharāḥ ||
baliṃ ca dāpayet tatra prāg ārādi tu mantrataḥ |

rakṣañ cai
va yathoddiṣṭāṃ yathā dhyāne tathātra ca |
prakāśitās tu ye sekā vidhivad dadyāt svamaṇḍale |
pūjā cābhyarthanā caiva yathākhyātā tathātra ca |

śuddhaṃ dvipuṭaṃ vilikhyāsu gauryādī
nāṃ likhet tataḥ ||
pūrveṇa likhet karttī dakṣiṇe paścime tathā |
uttare agnikoṇe ca naiṛtī vāyavye tathā ||
aiśāne ca yathākathitam asyordve ca tathā tathā |
paramaratau na ca bhāva na bhāvaka |

na ca vigraha na ca grāhya
na grāhaka |
māṃsa na sroṇita viṣṭha na mūtraṃ
na ca ghṛṇa moha na saucapavitraṃ |
rāga na dveṣa na moha na īrṣyān
na ca paiśūnyaṃ na māna na dṛśyaṃ ||
bhāva na bhāvaka śatru na mitraṃ
ity āha vajragarbhākhyaḥ kasmād bhūtātmakaṃ bhavet ||

tatrāha bhagavāṃ vajrī ḍākinīnāṃ su
khaṃdadaḥ |

div.p: he bhagavan kasmān mahābhautikaḥ skandhaḥ ||

lg.l: tajo jāyate gharṣaṇād gamanād vāyuḥ prakīrttitaḥ |

tasmāt saukhyaṃ na tatvā
khyam mahābhūtaṃ yataḥ sukhaṃ |
sahajābhyāṃ yad utpannaṃ sahajaṃ tat prakīrttitaṃ ||

kṛpopāyo bhaved yogī mudrā hetuviyo
gataḥ ||
na mantrajāpo na tapo na homaḥ
na māṇḍaleyan na ca maṇdalaṃ ca |
sa mantrajāpaḥ sa tapaḥ sa homaḥ |

div.p: || abhiṣekapaṭalo nāma daśamaḥ || ||

lg.l: samā krūrā lalāṭī ca pātanā kathitā sadā |

vaśyā vāmāśritā dṛṣṭiḥ puttalī
dvau ca vāmataḥ ||
ākṛṣṭi dakṣiṇe bhāge puttalī dvau ca ūrdvataḥ
madhyamā stambhanā dṛṣṭir dvau ca nāsājaḍāntare ||

pūrakeṇa tu cākṛṣṭiḥ ta
bhanā śāntikena tu ||

bhrāntir atra na ka
rttavyā acintyā buddhaṛddhayaḥ ||
māraṇair nātra kārya syāt samayabhedaḥ paraṃ bhavet ||
sarvākāryan tu karttavyaṃ hitvā satvasya vañcanaṃ |
nādiṃ gādiṃ tathā hādiṃ antasva ādisvaṃ ca vā ||

saptāvartta to lakṣyaṃ
hevajroktais tu lakṣaṇaiḥ |

saptacchāyā bhavet tasya dṛṣṭvā yo
gī tu lakṣayet ||

div.p: vajragarbhābhisaṃbodhi nāma kalparājaḥ samāptaḥ || ||

vajragarbha uvāca
deśayatu yathānyāyaṃ pratiṣṭhālakṣaṇaṃ śubhaṃ |
bhagavān vajrasārātmā sarvabuddhaikasaṃgrahaḥ ||

bhagavān āha ||
homaṃ kṛtvā yathāproktaṃ vartta|| ||yitvā tu maṇḍa
laṃ |
pradoṣe saṃskaret pratimāṃ kṛtvādhivāsanādikaṃ |

lg.l: śāntike vartulaṃ kuṇḍaṃ caturasran tu pauṣṭikaṃ |

trikoṇaṃ māraṇaṃ proktaṃ śeṣā
tatraiva sādhayet ||
dvihastaṃ ekahastaṃ ca adhordve pauṣṭikaṃ mataṃ |
viṃśatyaṅgulam arddham vā adhi cordve ca māraṇaṃ ||

śuklavarṇṇa bha
vec chāntau pītaṃ pauṣṭike tathā |
māraṇe kṛṣṇavarṇṇañ ca vaśye raktaṃ prakīrttitaṃ ||
yathā vaśye tathākṛṣṭiḥ dveṣādyā yātha māraṇe |

tilaṃ śāntau dadhi pauṣṭau māraṇe kaṇṭa
kan tathā ||
dveṣādau kaṇṭakai proktaṃ vaśyākṛṣṭau ca utpalaṃ |

div.p:
oṃ agnaye mahātejā sarvakāmaprasādhakaṃ ||
kāruṇyakṛtasatvārthaṃ asmiṃ sannihito bhavaḥ ||

āgamiṣyasi yathā
kāle sarvasiddhi kuruṣva me ||
agnisantoṣaṇamantraḥ ||

oṁ nī rī hūṁ khaḥ pādyamantraḥ ||

prathamābhyā
sakālasya sthānaṃ vai kalpitaṃ śubhaṃ |
svagṛheṣu niśākāle siddho ham iti cetasā |
candanair hasta marddayan kaupīnair cchādayan kaṭiṃ |

sakṛd abhyāsitā vidyā sadyaḥ pratyaya
kāriṇī |
rāga dveṣa tathā mohaiḥ sādhako naiva kliṣyate ||
kathaṃ te kṣaṇam apy ekaṃ yoginaḥ santi raurave |
pañcānantaryakārī ca prāṇivadhe ratāś ca ye ||
api tu ye janmahīnā ye mūrkhāḥ krūrakarmaṇiḥ |

kurūpā vi
kalagātrāś ca sidhyante te pi cintayā ||
māsam ekaṃ cared guptaṃ yāvan mudrā na labhyate |
gṛhītvā amukīṃ mudrāṃ satvārthaṃ kuru vajradhṛk |
māsam ekena bhavyā sā bhaven naivātra saṃśayaḥ |

athavā cātmana śaktyā kṛṣṭvā mudrāṃ prakalpa
yet |
tāṃ ca gṛhya carec caryām ātmano dhairyapratyayāt |
na caryā bhogataḥ proktā yā khyātā yā bhīmarūpiṇīṃ

mudrayā mudrayo dvābhyāṃ mudrā
siddhiḥ kathaṃ bhavet ||
tīradvayaṃ bhaved ghaṇṭā kiñjalkaṃ bolakaṃ bhavet ||
upāyaḥ saṃbhavo yasmāt layaṃ prajñā bhavāntakī |

sty utpādoau naiva tatvataḥ |
pralayāl līyate kaścil layābhāvān na ca kṣayaḥ |

prapañcaṃ svapnavat kṛtvā prapañcair aprapañcaye
t |
yathā māyā yathā svapnaṃ yathā syād antarābhavaḥ |

tasyaivaitat pra
bhāva syā maṇḍalaṃ nānyasaṃbhavaṃ |
sukhaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ sukhaṃ pītaṃ sukhaṃ raktaṃ sukhaṃ śitam |
sukhaṃ syāmaṃ sukhaṃ nīlaṃ sukhaṃ kṛtsnaṃ carācaraṃ ||

sukhaṃ prajñā sukhopāya sukhaṃ kundurujaṃ
tathā |
sukho bhāvaḥ sukhābhāvo vajrasatvaḥ sukhaḥ smṛtaḥ |

utpanno bhāvanāhīna utpattyā kiṃ prayo
janaṃ ||
dehābhāve kutaḥ saukhyaṃ saukhyaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyate |
yathā puṣpāśritaṃ gandhaṃ puṣpābhāvān na gamyate |
bhāvo haṃ naiva bhāvo haṃ buddho haṃ vastubodhanāt |

mān na jāna
nti ye bhāvāḥ kausīdyopahatāś ca ye ||
vyākhyāto m ahaṃ dharmaḥ śrotāhaṃ svagaṇair yutaṃ |
sādhyo haṃ jagatcchāstā loko haṃ laukiko py ahaṃ |
tathā ca pratyayaṃ putra andhakāre pradīpavat |
vinā tenaiva saukhyaṃ syāt sukhaṃ hitvā bhaven na saḥ |
tasmād buddho na bhāvaḥ syād abhāvarūpo pi naiva saḥ |
tasmāt sahajaṃ jagat sarva sahajaṃ svarūpam ucyate |

karṇṇe toyaṃ yathā viṣṭaṃ pratito
yena kṛṣyate |
tathā bhāvavikalpo py ākāraiḥ sodhyate khalu |
yathā pāvakadagdhāś ca vidyaṃte vahninā punaḥ |

yena yena hi ba
dhyaṃte jantavo raudrakarmaṇā |

viparītabhāvanā hy eṣā na jñātā 'buddhatī
rthakaiḥ |
eka eva mahānandaḥ pañcatāṃ yāti bhedanaiḥ |

kaṭhinasya mohadha
rmatvāt moho vairocano mataḥ |
bodhicittaṃ dravaṃ yasmād dravam apdhātukaṃ mataṃ |

dvayor gharṣaṇasaṃyogāt te
jo jāyate sadā |
rāgo amitābhavajra syād rāgas tejasi saṃbhavet |
sukhaṃ rāga bhaved raktaṃ raktir ākāśalakṣaṇā |
eka eva mahac cittaṃ pañcarūpeṇa lakṣitaṃ |

lg.l:
atha vajrī sa
rvatantranidānaṃ nāmopāyaṃ yoginīṇāṃ kathayām āsa ||
samvarañ cābhiṣekaṃ ca sandhyābhāṣan tathaiva ca |

ānandakṣaṇabhedañ ca | anyañ ca bho
janādikaṃ ||
abhiṣekāj jñāyate samyag ekākāram mahat sukhaṃ ||
atha bhagavantaṃ vajrasatvaṃ yoginya evam āhuḥ |
evaṃkāraṃ kim ucyeta ḍākināṃ tu samvaraṃ ||
ānandās tatra jāyante kṣaṇo bhedena bheditāḥ |
vicitrañ ca vipākañ ca vimardda vilakṣaṇaṃ tathā |

catuḥ
kṣaṇaṃ samāgamya evaṃ jānanti yoginaḥ ||

vimarddam ālocanaṃ proktaṃ sukha
bhukta mayeti ca |
ācārya guhya prajñā ca caturthaṃ tat punas tathā ||
hasitaśuddhyā tv ācāryam īkṣaṇe guhyakas tathā |

prajñā pāṇyāvāptau
ca tat puna dvandatantrake ||

pāṇibhyān tu samāliṃgya prajñā vai ṣoḍaśābdi
kāṃ |

prajñāṃ pūjaye
c chāstā arccayitvā samarppayet |
śāstā brūyān mahāsatva gṛhṇa mudrā sukhāvahā |
śāstā tam ājñāpayati kunduru kuru vajradhṛk |
mudrāyuktaṃ guruṃ dṛṣṭvā stutipūjāṃ kared yathā |
yathā yūyaṃ mahātmāno mamāpi kuru tad vitu |
miṣṭānnapānakhādyañ ca madanaṃ ca balam mahataraṃ |

ābhi pūjābhi ṣiśya pūjayed vajradhā
riṇaṃ |
śāstā brūyāt mahāsatva dhāraṇīyaṃ mahat sukhaṃ |
ity evaṃ vadate vajrī śiṣyaṃ dīkṣya kriyācayaṃ |

sthiracalaṃ vyāpya saṃti
ṣṭhen māyārūpī ca bhāti ca |

p.l: athavā sarvayoginīnāṃ mṛṣitvā vajragarbho bhagavantam evam āhuḥ ||
deśayantu yathānyāyaṃ bhagavanto bhrāntir me bhūt ||

lg.l: maṇḍalaṃ sāram ity uktaṃ bodhicittaṃ mahat sukhaṃ |

ādānan taṃ karotī
hi maṇḍalaṃ mīlanam mataṃ |
adattañ ca tvayā grāhyaṃ sevayet pararayoṣitaḥ ||
ekacittaṃ prāṇivadhaṃ prāṇaṃ cittaṃ yato mataṃ |

atha sa
rvayoginyo bhagavantam evam āhuḥ ||
ke punas te viṣayāḥ kānindriyāṇiḥ kim āyatanaṃ katamāḥ skandhāḥ | ke punas te dhātavaḥ | eṣāṃ kiṃ svabhāvaṃ ||
rūpa śabdas tathā gandho rasa sparśas tathaiva ca |
dharmadhātusvabhāvaś ca ṣaḍ ete viṣayāḥ matāḥ |

cakṣuḥ srotrañ ca ghrāṇañ ca jihvā kā
yo manas tathā |
indriyaṃ viṣayaṃ caiva indriyaṃ vijñānam eva ca |
svabhāvaṃ cādyanutpannaṃ na satyaṃ na mṛṣā tathā |

div.p:
tad yathā kāṇḍaṃ ca mathanīyaṃ ca puruṣahastavyāyāmañ cākasmād agnir upajāyate | asau agni na kāṇḍai tiṣṭhati na mathanīye na puruṣahasta
yoḥ | sarvākāraḥ parigaveṣyamāṇa ekasminn api nāsti sa cāgni na satyan na mṛṣā | evaṃ sarvadharmā yoginyo manasikuruta ||

atha nairātmyayoginīpramukhāḥ sarva
vajraḍākinyaḥ pañcāmṛtaṃ gṛhītvā samayadravyaṃ ca bhagavantaṃ vajrasatvaṃ pūjayanti | kunduruyogenānurāgayanti | vidhāpayanti ca vajrāmṛtarasaṃ ||

lg.l:
tataḥ paścād bhagavāṃ tuṣṭe sati
adhiṣṭhānaṃ darśayati ||

div.p:
ucchāhaprāptāḥ harṣaprāptāḥ
sarvā devatyo dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃ tenāñjali praṇamya bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ śṛṇvanti ||

lg.l:
khānaṃ pānaṃs tathāprāptaṃ gamyāga
myan na varjayet |
snāna saucaṃ na kurvīta grāmyadharman tu varjayet
mantraṃ naiva japed dhīmān dhyānan naivāvalambayet |

bhakṣaṇīyaṃ ba

asmiṃ tantre na hotavyaṃ mudrābandhakriyā pi ca |
rahasyaṃ paramaṃ vakṣye śṛṇu devi varānane |
ayogya syād aviddhena viduḥ sat ruvidāyakaḥ |

tadvat saṃsārakaṃ ratnaṃ pañcakāma
guṇair yuktaṃ |
avisuddho viṣatāṃ yānti suddho pīyūṣavad bhavet |
yena rūpeṇa sadbhūtan tam ahaṃ vacmi sṛṇvatāṃ |

kṛpa
ā locane rakte kṛṣṇāṃgo maitracittataḥ ||
aṣṭāsya vimokṣāṣṭau sūnyatā ṣoḍasa bhujā smṛtāḥ ||
māṃsena pukkasī khyātā raktena sabarī kalpitā |
caṇḍālī sukram ity uktaṃ ḍombinī majjamedayoḥ |

carmma bodhyaṃgasaptaṃ tu asthi satyacatuṣṭa
yaṃ ||
yena mantreṇa jantūṇāṃ karmmāṇi yānti siddhidāṃ ||
śṛṇu devi mahāprājño mantran te kathayāmy ahaṃ ||
ādau vairocanaṃ dattvā ūṣmāṇaṃ tu caturthakaṃ |

anena lakṣa
jāpena stambhayej jagataḥ sadā
ādau varṇṇaṃ dhīpaṃ datvā tadanu khecarikān tataḥ |
svāhāntaṃ yojitaṃ kṛtvā buddhānām api vaśīkaret ||
sasūnyaṃ svāhāntaṃ yojayet prājñaḥ buddhānām apy uccāṭayet ||
hrīḥkāraṃ yojayet tadanu svāhāntasvāhāntaṃ punar ācaret ||

div.p:
dviguṇitaṃ pañcamasya tṛtīyaṃ dvitīyasya tṛtīyaṃ | vahnibhūṣitaṃ hūṃkā
ratrayayojitaṃ | pañcamasya dvitīyaṃ | tṛtīyasya prathamaṃ svāhāntaṃ | ṣaḍbhujasya mantraḥ || ||

vairocanādi caturthasya prathamaṃ | hutāsanasaṃyuktaṃ vettā
lībhūṣitaṃ antasthānān tṛtīyakaṃ ghasmarībhūṣitaṃ | prathamasya prathamaṃ | antasthānāt prathamaṃ vajrībhūṣitaṃ |

kṣakā
ra caurībhūṣitaṃ | pañcamasya prathamaṃ ūṣmāṇāṃ caturthakaṃ vajraḍākinibhūṣitaṃ | śūnyākrāntaṃ triguṇitaṃ phaṭsvāhāntaṃ | dvibhujasya mantraḥ || ||

nairātmyā
prathamasya prathamaṃ | dvitīyasya prathamaṃ | tṛtīyasya prathamaṃ | caturthasya prathamaṃ | pañcamasya prathamaṃ | antasthānān prathamam | ūṣmāṇāṃ prathamaṃ | vairocanā
di svāhāntaṃ || purakṣobhanamantro lakṣajāpaḥ || ||

antasthānān dvitīyaṃ kṣakārasya | padadviguṇitaṃ | hūṁkāratrayaṃ vairocanādi phaṭkāravidarbhitaṃ svāhā
ntaṃ | bhūmisodhanamantraḥ ||
vairocanādi tadanu vajra hūṃkārāntam || khānapānādhiṣṭhānaṃ ||

vairocanādi tadanu
akāro mukham ūṣmāṇaṃ tṛtīyakaṃ | antasthānāc caturthakaṃ upari vahnibhūṣitaṃ | dharmāṇān tadanu vajrādeyaṃ dyanutpannatvāt | oṁ āḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā || sarvabhau
tikabalimantraḥ || ||
hevajre mantroddhārapaṭalaḥ nāma navamaḥ || ||

lg.l:
nairātmyā cumbayitvā tu jāpaviṣayaṃ pra
kāśate ||
sphaṭikena stambhanaṃ jāpaṃ | raktaṃ vaśye ca candanaṃ

varṣā
paṇaṃ gajaniraṃśukaiḥ māraṇaṃ mahisya ca |
stambhane kṣīrapānan tu | vaśye svacchandam ācaret |
māraṇaṃ sihlakaṃ caiva | ākṛṣṭau caḥ catursamaḥ |

vidveṣe | śālijaṃ pro
ktaṃ | uccāṭane kasturikā smṛtāḥ |
athavā antasvam ādisvaṃ | gādi hādiṃ tathaiva caḥ ||

div.p: hevajre jāpapaṭalo nāma daśamaḥ || ||

lg.l: bhage liṃgya pratiṣṭhāpya ity āha cakranāyakaḥ |

dehināṃ svakulaṃ vakṣye pra
jñāpāramite śṛṇu |
anāmikāmūlake yasya striyo vā puruṣasya vā |
navaśūkaṃ bhaved vajraṃ akṣobhyaṃ kulam uttamaṃ ||

vairocanasya bhavec cakraṃ amitanāthasya paṅka
jaṃ |
yo hi yogī bhavet kṛṣṇo akṣobhyos tasya devatā |
yo hi yogī mahāgauro vairocanaḥ kuladevatā |

yo hi yo
gī mahāsyāmā amoghas tasya devatā |
yo hi yogī mahāpiṃgo ratneśaḥ kuladevatāḥ |
raktagauro hi yo yogī amitābhaḥ kuladevatāḥ |

svetagauro hi
yo yogī tasya sarvakulaṃ bhavet |
tathāgatānāṃ kulās tai syuḥ rūpam āsṛtya sāmvṛtaṃ ||

strīṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cai
tat yathā puṃsi tathaiva ca |
tāsām api kulās te syu sāṃvṛtācārarūpataḥ |

nairātmyāṃ bodhayom āsa śṛṇu devi
prapūjanaṃ |

cūṣaṇaṃ na
ranāsāyāḥ pānam adharamadhurasya ca |
madanāṅkaṃ karaiḥ karmma bolayaṃ kurute sadā |

muhurmuhuḥ kā
mayed vajrī adhordvaṃ nirīkṣayet |
karppūraṃ pīyate tatra madaṃ caiva viseṣataḥ |

balasya bhakṣaṇan tatra kuryāt karpūra
hetunā || ||

div.p: hevajre sahajārthayogapaṭalo nāma ekādeśaḥ || ||

div.div:
athāha vajrī catasro abhisekagāthāṃ kathayām āsa |
mahāvajraṃ mahāghaṇṭāṃ
gṛhṇa vajrapratiṣṭhitaṃ |
vajrācāryo si adyaiva kuru śiṣyasaṃgrahaṃ |
yathā buddhair anārais tu sicyaṃte bodhiputrakāḥ |
mayā guhyābhiṣekena sikto cittadhārayā |
ratidāṃ sthānadāṃ devīṃ visvarūpo maṇoramāṃ |
gṛhṇa gṛhṇa mahāsatva gṛhītvā pūjanaṃ kuruḥ ||
idaṃ jñāna mahāsūkṣmaṃ vajramaṇḍan nabhopamaṃ |
virajaskaṃ mokṣadaṃ śā
ntaṃ pitā te tvam api svayaṃ ||
vajrapadmādhiṣṭhānamantraḥ ||
oṁ padma sukhādhāra mahāsukhaṃdada
caturānandabhāga visva hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ kāryaṃ kurusva me ||
oṃ vajra mahādve
ṣa caturānandadāyaka
khagamukhaikaraso nātha hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ kāryaṃ kurusva me ||
sirasi oṁkāraṃ hṛdi hūṃkāraṃ | kiñjalke āḥkāraṃ || ||
mahātantrarājamāyā
kalpaḥ || iti dvātriṃsatkalpoddhṛtakalpadvayam e ..kaṃ hevajraḍākinījālasamvare mahātantrarājaḥ samāptaḥ || ||
... na śrīhevajrākhyaṃ sarvatantraniruttaraṃ ye na jānanti hevajraṃ sarvatantraniruttaraṃ | te siddhikāṃkṣiṇa bhrāntā bhramanti bhavacakrake | yasya yasya kulodbhūtā tasya tasyānurūpakāḥ
yoginya samvṛtākārāḥ pūjanīyā vicakṣaṇaiḥ te ḍhaukayaṃnti sarvasvaṃ yogināṃ satsukha svayaṃ | svaparārthaikavṛttīnāṃ gambhīrodāracetasām iti || ||
ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetu teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ || ||
caṇḍogra bhayabhīkara surapati digdanti pṛṣṭhya sthi vajraṃ trajjani kādada śa śa ta ta, pīṭhas tato vāsuki, śubhraḥ suptaphaṇo ghano jaladharaś caṇḍogra nāmā mahā |
caṇḍogra bhayabhīkara surapati diganti pṛṣyasthi vajraṃ trakka nikādada śa śa ta ta, pīṭhas tato vāsuki, śubhraḥ supta phaṇo ghano jaladharaś caṇḍogra nāmā mahā |
